turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking of pizza for dinner, any suggestions?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I know of a nice place down the street called Pizanos, do you want me to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do they have good Calzones? How is their toppings?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They're very good, I would recommend everything they have.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay can yo call and ask the price of the mediums and larges?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will do that, any other questions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would also like to know the price of the XL and how much each topping is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will do that, hold on.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I got all the prices for you, I'll text them to you now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, can you also see how long the delivery would be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I can call back and ask that.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, these prices look reasonable.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They said the delivery would be 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine, I'll order two large pepperonis and a supreme Calzone.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay let me order that right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Remember to get some drinks, I think Pepsi would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it, they'll be here in about 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much, I'm really going to enjoy this dinner.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem at all boss.
